title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Tomas Kral
raw_text: Cover Art  Pizza Break    Tomas Kral is a Czech artist who worked for four years at the UPP company as a senior team leader on feature films such as 2012, RedTails, Season of the Witch, Pandorum, Salt, and others. These days, he works as CG artist / VFX artist for R.U.R. Postproduction and freelances for other clients.
text:
Cover Art
Pizza Break
Tomas Kral is a Czech artist who worked for four years at the UPP company as a senior team leader on feature films such as 2012, RedTails, Season of the Witch, Pandorum, Salt, and others. These days, he works as CG artist / VFX artist for R.U.R. Postproduction and freelances for other clients.
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Pizza Break by Tomas Kral
